product_overview: İmtihan Veb is a browser-based exam preparation planner that uses AI to generate topic lists, creates daily study plans up to an exam date, and tracks progress locally via LocalStorage.
core_goals: Allow students to create and manage subjects and topic lists (AI-assisted and manual).
Generate balanced daily study plans from topics until a chosen exam date based on daily study hours.
Provide an easy daily checklist to mark completed topics and measure streaks and progress.
Offer AI-based study support: topic generation, chat Q&A and quiz generation.
Keep all data client-side using LocalStorage (no server required) and provide clear UI validation and empty states.

features.name: Subject Management
features.description: Create, list and remove subjects (fənn) from the home page; opening a modal is used to add a subject.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click "Yeni Fənn Əlavə Et" button -> Fill subject name field with "Fizika" -> Fill topic range field with "İstilik hadisələrinə qədər" -> Click "Əlavə et" button -> See new subject card on /
Navigate to / -> Click "Yeni Fənn Əlavə Et" button -> Leave subject name field empty -> Click "Əlavə et" button -> See validation error message indicating subject name is required
Navigate to / -> Click delete icon on subject card for "Fizika" -> See confirmation modal -> Click confirm delete in modal -> See subject card removed from /

features.name: Subject Setup & Topic Editor
features.description: Configure subject details and build the topic list using AI generation or manual edits; edit order, add and remove topics in the topic editor.
user_flows: Navigate to /subject/:id/setup -> See subject details on the setup page -> Click "Mövzuları Təyin Et" or "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" button -> Wait for AI to return topics JSON -> See generated topics listed on the setup page -> Click "Təsdiqlə və Plan Qur" button -> Navigate to /subject/:id/topics -> See topics in the topic editor

Navigate to /subject/:id/topics -> Click add topic button -> Fill new topic name field -> Click save topic button -> See new topic appear in the topic list -> Click topic edit icon next to a topic -> Change topic name field -> Click save edit button -> See updated topic name in list

Navigate to /subject/:id/setup -> Click "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" button -> Receive AI error or invalid JSON response -> See error message indicating AI generation failed -> Click button to open manual topic editor -> Manually add topics and save

features.name: Study Planning (Plan Config & Daily Plan)
features.description: Set exam date and daily study hours to generate a daily plan that assigns topics to dates; view and mark daily tasks as completed.
user_flows: Navigate to /subject/:id/plan-config -> See plan configuration form -> Set exam date to a future date using the date picker -> Set daily study hours via the slider -> Click "Planı Yarat" or Generate plan button -> See confirmation that plan was generated and stored -> Navigate to /subject/:id/daily -> See today's assigned topics listed
Navigate to /subject/:id/plan-config -> Open exam date picker -> Select a past date -> Click "Planı Yarat" button -> See validation error indicating exam date cannot be in the past

Navigate to /subject/:id/plan-config -> Set exam date to tomorrow (very short time) -> Click "Planı Yarat" button -> See plan generated with multiple topics assigned to the same day and an informational alert about condensed schedule

Navigate to /subject/:id/daily -> See today's topics list -> Click checkbox on a topic to mark it completed -> See localStorage update for today's completedTopics array -> See streak increment if previous day also had completions

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Visualize completion statistics, percent complete and streaks for a subject on the progress page.
user_flows: Navigate to /subject/:id/progress -> See progress charts and statistics including completed topics, percent complete and streak -> Observe streak value reflecting recent completions
Navigate to /subject/:id/progress -> See empty state message indicating no plan or no completions when subject has no plan or no completed topics

features.name: AI Chat & Quiz
features.description: In-subject AI assistant for Q&A and on-demand quiz generation per topic (modal-based); supports math formatting and selectable difficulty/size.
user_flows: Navigate to /subject/:id/daily -> Click AI chat open button or assistant area -> Type question "Nyutonun qanunlarını izah et" -> Click send -> See AI response with explanation and formatted math where applicable

Navigate to /subject/:id/daily -> On a topic card click "Test Yarat" button -> Choose number of questions (e.g., 5) and difficulty (Asan/Orta/Çətin) in the quiz modal -> Click "Create Quiz" button -> See quiz questions listed in modal -> Complete quiz and click submit -> See results summary with correct/incorrect counts and percent

Navigate to /subject/:id/daily -> On a topic card click "Test Yarat" button -> AI returns an error or times out -> See error message indicating quiz generation failed -> Click close to dismiss error modal
